DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Diagnostic procedure use drug radiolabeled folic acid image may effective detect ovarian cancer . PURPOSE : Diagnostic trial study effectiveness radiolabeled folic acid plus image detect ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Radiolabeled Folic Acid Imaging Detect Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate effectiveness folic acid conjugate indium In 111 diagnose ovarian cancer locate metastatic disease . OUTLINE : This diagnostic study . Patients receive injection folic acid conjugated indium In 111 . The patient undergo image study various time point ( e.g. , 1 , 4 , 24 hour ) . Patients undergo exploratory surgery , result compare imaging study . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 30 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Suspected ovarian cancer OR Recurrence ovarian cancer Scheduled exploratory surgery PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : Zubrod 02 Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : WBC least 3000/mm3 Granulocyte count least 1500/mm3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm3 Hemoglobin least 9 g/dL Hepatic : Bilirubin great 2.0 mg/dL SGPT SGOT great 2 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) Alkaline phosphatase great 2 time ULN No acute hepatitis Renal : Creatinine great 1.4 mg/dL BUN great 1.5 time ULN No known suspect kidney disease Cardiovascular : No history congestive heart failure No unstable angina No myocardial infarction within 6 month Other : Not pregnant nursing No septicemia severe infection No medical condition would preclude administration large fluid volume short period time PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : At least 3 month since prior cytotoxic chemotherapy Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : At least 3 month since prior radiotherapy Surgery : See Disease Characteristics Other : At least 2 day since prior folic acid supplement At least 5 day since nonsteroidal antiinflammatory medication
DOC.keyword: stage I ovarian germ cell tumor
stage II ovarian germ cell tumor
stage III ovarian germ cell tumor
stage IV ovarian germ cell tumor
